message: The self-assessment in this app is called the PTSD Checklist or ‚ÄúPCL-5‚Äù for short.
This scale has been used with people with PTSD for screening, diagnosis, and monitoring for many years and has been scientifically validated.
It was originally developed in 1993 by the National Center for PTSD.
It can give you some valuable information about how severe your symptoms are, and if you are getting better or worse over time.
